original_title: Uninterrupted fuel supply during festive season
original_body_lines: The Fuel Distributors’ Association has guaranteed that fuel supply at all filling stations will remain uninterrupted during the festive season.

Kapila Naotunna, the Joint Secretary of the Association, stated that this assurance stems from a consensus reached after a court injunction barred the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) from imposing a monthly usage fee.
